genresAdvancedInfo.name: slovak metal
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Slovak metal is a genre of heavy music that has been popular in the country since the 1980s. It is characterized by its aggressive guitar riffs, thundering drums, and often dark and nihilistic lyrics. Slovak metal bands often draw inspiration from a variety of sub-genres, including death metal, black metal, and thrash metal.
